title: I’m Trying to Be Like Jesus
lyrics: I’m trying to be like Jesus;
I’m trying to love as he did, in all that I do and say.  At times I am tempted to make a wrong choice,  But I try to listen as the still small voice whispers,
“Love one another as Jesus loves you.
Try to show kindness in all that you do.  Be gentle and loving in deed and in thought,  For these are the things Jesus taught.”
I’m trying to love my neighbor;
I’m learning to serve my friends.
I watch for the day of gladness
I try to remember the lessons he taught.  Then the Holy Spirit
